Entry.JapaneseText: まったく、子供が仲良く遊ぶ事も できないなんて、信じらんねーよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Man, to think that these kids aren't allowed to play with one another... I can't believe this!

Entry.JapaneseText: 大人の都合で振り回されるのは いつも子供だ。
Entry.EnglishText: It is always the children who suffer due to the actions of adults.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも……その大人たちも階級制度なんて わけのわからないものに振り回されてるわ……
Entry.EnglishText: But... those adults are also being oppressed by that incoherent class system...

Entry.JapaneseText: うーん……一概に誰が悪いかなんて、 言えないって事か？
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm... So I guess you can't say who's really to blame?

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、子供の笑顔を奪う大人は 間違っているさ……
Entry.EnglishText: No, those adults who are robbing children of their smiles are at fault.
